name: Naufrago - The Crab Island
description:
Naufrago - The Crab Island 

This is a test version, of the first island in the game. Try to survive, craft some items, and explore the island. See more information about the game here -> https://anageek.github.io/naufrago/

Q - Open/close  Inventory

E - Interact with the items

R - Hold R to remove  the object from the world back to inventory

P - Pause 

WASD - Walk

C - Crouch

Space - Jump

Obs: I'm aware of some issues like the sensibility, comment below  and let me know your experience playing my first game
